title: केरळमध्ये दरवर्षी 600 हत्तींचा मृत्यू होतो का? वाचा सत्य
author: marathi.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
600 elephants death a year: deliberate misinformation!!!



TRUTH



During 10 years , 772 wild elephants died of natural causes(old age , internal fighting, predation, accident )and 64 unnaturally (hunting,electrocution, vehicle hits )

Population :5706 in 2017 

Increasing Trend
